title: Amtrak Prepares to Reduce Service Because of Vaccine Mandate
sub_head: Long-distance routes could be limited as rail line has suffered from worker shortages throughout the pandemic
body:
Amtrak said it expects it wonâ€™t be able to operate all of its scheduled passenger trains when its vaccine mandate goes into effect in January.
Long-distance service will likely be particularly affected as Amtrak is expected to have fewer work crews along those routes, Amtrak President Stephen Gardner said Thursday.
